metadata.title: CVE-2022-0306 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Heap buffer overflow in PDFium in Google Chrome prior to 97.0.4692.99allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
